indicator_name: 시간에 따른 물 이용 효율성 변화
target_name: 2030년까지 모든 부문에서 물 사용 효율을 높이고 물 부족 문제를 해결하고 물 부족으로 고통 받는 인구 수를 상당한 수준으로 감소시키기 위해 지속가능한 담수의 취수와 공급을 보장

en.title: Change in water-use efficiency over time
en.graph_title: Water Use Efficiency (United States dollars per cubic meter)
en.indicator_name: Change in water-use efficiency over time
en.target: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity
en.global_metadata_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 428kB)
en.un_notes: Fast Track; Reviewed at 5th IAEG-SDG meeting; More information on terminology is requested
en.computation_units: United States dollars per cubic meter
en.page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
